content.detailedDescription: This is a eventful evening for my family her in indiana.  this is the 2nd report i am filing with you.  me and my neighbors friend were sitting on our porch talking about the events of the evening.  i looked up and to my left and seen what looked like something coming towards us from the east, moving slowly with a brownish reddish glow.  no noise.  silent..I pulled her into the yard and said look, do you see that, tell me if you do or not.  she said, what the heck is that?  by that time is was directly to our left some and it was low enough that we could see it was a triangle and had a brownish reddish tint to it as if illuminated for night.  it was the type of illumination at night when a tent has a night light on it it and your are outside looking at it.  very soft lighting.  i sent her inside to get my son and his friend.  by the time they came out to look at this one, it was further to the west but he also seen it but not as close as we did..Very beautiful indeed..Just like it was floating past us just cruising on a saturday night..
content.summary: Beautiful dimly lit brownish reddish illuminated triangle.

content.detailedDescription: We saw the same thing that the other post described but the distance of the objects seemed to be no less than five to fifteen miles away. the height of the objects seemed to be over 500 feet in the air. it was at the same time on saturday morning but our location was near mulberry and shields.
content.summary: Colorado post.

content.detailedDescription: Around 10:58 pm est i witnessed what seemed like a star moving over the sky heading in a curved shaped path at an increasing rate of speed before disappearing after passing the big dipper. over the past 4 months i have seen 4 of these object in various locations in the sky after 8:30 pm to 1 am est in canton, north georgia (usually when i go in my backyard and look up at the night sky when having a cigarette.) i will begin recording with a camera as soon as i can pick one up, due to the recent frequency of sightings.  thanks
content.summary: Ufo over canton, georgia around the big dipper.

content.detailedDescription: Just a beautiful clear evening.  we were all outside laying back in the grass watching the sky and talking about different things.  all of a sudden we seen a something streak across the sky at a fast rate of speed and just disappear.  i said it was maybe a satellite.  within 10 minutes here comes the hello signal.  not a plane nor anything in my 57 years i have felt like i have seen and i have seen a ufo when i was 8 years old. this didn't look like anything that was on a course as it moved like jumping around.  does a satellite give you a bright flash of light right over your head then move on.  i believe whatever it was knew we were giving it all our attention and rather enjoyed us.  it seemed to say hello by the making the flash at us directly over our head.  i would say it was few miles up but seemed to know what was directly underneath it, like us.....We lost sight of it because it left our eye range.  we all felt it was acknowledging us below and it seemed to know we were all excited and talking about it...Interesting to say the least...
content.summary: Seemed to say hello to us with a big pulse of light.

content.detailedDescription:
While on a short sightseeing vacation trip to nm. from ca. from 9 jun 2009 to 12 june 2009,on wednesday, 10 june 2009 both my friend and i were traveling west leaving roswell towards chaco canyon national historic park via us 70. we decided to follow a route via us 380 west towards socorro, and see if we could find any available lodging on route. after securing a room at a local motel in the town of capitan, we decided to go for a ride and check out the countryside and stars that night, since the skies had turned clear enough to do so. somewhere around 8:00 pm(20:00 hrs)we found state 234 eastbound and headed towards roswell (lincoln county). 

for those unfamiliar with, nm state 230 is a 2 way road which appears to be mostly used by local farmer traffic and apparently not a very busy road at night. providing no light pole illumination, night falls quickly after dusk(or sometime between 8:45 pm and 9:10 pm or 20:45 to 21:10 hrs this time of the year). i had to engage the vehicle's high beam lights through out our entire ride, in order to better see the road's contour reflectors/markers/signs and also to avoid hitting any of the local wild life. in the 2.5 hours that we'd traveled to & from on this road, no other vehicles were encountered (nor could be seen at a far distance in the mostly flat landscape)in either direction.

sometime around 9:00 pm (21:00 hrs)we'd reached marker 41 on state 230 and after passing this marker, but before reaching 42, we decided that rather than continuing further in that direction, it was best to go trail back westbound for a spot to stop. so we turned the car around and parked just on the shoulder of the road by marker 41, before heading back west to capitan. we turned off our vehicle's engine & lights, and sat there inside the vehicle talking in total darkness, checking out the view and commenting on how dark it was for this chilly, clear and moonless starry night(up to that point...A full moon rose up later on round 10:00 or so pm (22:00 hrs). 

at about 9:10 pm (21:10 hrs) and with the western skies providing just a bit more of lighter dusk shades on the horizon than the darker eastern skies, my friend and i both noticed an object, and although we couldn't make out the outline of it's fuselage, it had a very bright and steady glowing orange to reddish light. at first i thought it to be an aircraft traveling typically fast in a straight line, in a nor-east to east bound direction and at what seemed to me to be at a 30 degree angle above both the barely visible horizon, and the western mountain range. 

having served in both the usmc & the uscg, i am well familiar with many types of military aircrafts, so it seemed somewhat odd to me that a craft traveling that fast at night, did not have any other type of fuselage lights "on", nor did it produce the familiar distant sounds of jet engines, or sound barrier blasts we're all familiar with. 

i was just about to say something to my friend when at that very same moment he bursted out saying: "what is that?"..."do you see it?"
no sooner does he asks... when this the object suddenly disappears,  vanishing for what we'd estimated to be 5-6 seconds, when it suddenly re-appears again further along on what seemed to me to be 2-3 clicks to the east (still traveling on a straight course)when suddenly it splits into two(2)lights(of same orangish-reddish color), which traveled parallel to each other at first, then separating/widening apart in an arc fashion, until just as quickly both lights seemed to rejoin or "melt" back into one single light- vanishing immediately thereafter. there was absolutely no sound or echo whatsoever of a collision, nor was there any visibly "hot" falling debris falling into the desert landscape, nor did we see any smoke or "trails" in the sky or fire coming out of the desert landscape thereafter. 

my friend and i sat there for about 5-10 minutes both perplexed and excited at what we'd seen. we asked ourselves a number of questions (i.E.: was it fireworks?...Was it a satellite?...Could it have been spotlights? but none of these questions seemed to have a rational answer as to what we'd witnessed on that night. the entire episode lasted approximately 30 seconds and although i had a digital camera with me, unfortunately i could not retrieve it and power it up quick enough to take pics of the event given how quickly it all happened.
content.summary: Night time sphere like object disappears then reappears within seconds, splitting in two then rejoins again before vanishing near roswell, nm.

content.detailedDescription: On june 13, 2009 myself and 3 friends decided to take a trip from boone,nc to brown mountain to see the famous brown mountain lights.  we arrived at brown mountain overlook at approx. 10:30pm. this was the first time any of us had ever been to this site and were immediately taken back by the frequency of the lights and the brightness.  aftert aking a short walk away from the rest of my friends to relieve myself, i turned back to face the group to begin walking back and noticed a very bright light that appeared to be over morganton.  the city is approx. 15miles away from the overlook and only the brightest lights and a few radio tower lights are visible. it was a very clear night with 1 thunderstorm way off in the distance just to the right of brown mountain as you look from the overlook.  at once i started asking my friends what they thought this light was. it was absolutely not a plane as there was heavy airplane traffic that night, and we had already observed numerous airplaines traveling over and across the sky in front and behind  us.  this light was brighter than anything else in the sky and was a white-orange in color. i did not appear to move horizontal or vertical and was well above the  height of any of the towers in the city visible in the distance.  just all all 4 of us were starting to watch it and guess what it was, the light suddenly just went off.  the light did not shoot away, it simply just went off like a light bulb would.  our first reaction was shock, i personally had a cold chill run down my back and had goose bumps on my entire body. we all stood there in disbelief but quickly turned out attention back to the brown mountain lights which were very active. approx. 25mins later the light reappeared over morganton, this time  not quite as bright and a little bit farther to our left and it stayed for approx. 2mins before just disappearing as it did the first time. approx. 30-40mins after this, the light re-appeared in about the same position as it had appeared the 2nd time only this time it moved as we watched it towards our left and seemed to just move away until i could no longer see it. by this time we were all basically in shock at what we were seeing and just stood there unable to really say anything, mouths wide open.  we were just about to leave as it was getting towards midnight and we had a bit of a drive back to boone when the object appeared again this time to the far right of the visable part of the city from where we were on the overlook. this time we all pretty much thought it might be a plane by the way it looked until it just simply went from being the brightest thing in the sky to gone in the blink of an eye. we attempted to get pictures with our cell-phones and with my friends digital camera but with no results.
content.summary: Observed a bright white-orange light seemingly over morganton while on brown mountain overlook.

content.detailedDescription: Witness was traveling on route 40 east towards pole tavern and route 77 after driving through woodstown nj.  she noticed a strange black triangle in the sky and she pulled to the side of the road to see it better.  it hovered over the tree line which was a short distance from her car.  she noticed the object from the drivers side of the car with the window down. there was no noise or movement.  it just hovered there...On the underside of the triangle it was lit up with lights that were bright but not blinding. ...See drawing....She could not tell if the middle of the triangle was filled in or not...Sky was clear and it was aprox 9 pm at night...She was coming home from her hair dresser in pennsville  nj.
content.summary: Witness sighted a black triangle with light on the bottom side of the object, hovered, no noise...Size of a baseball at arms length.

content.detailedDescription:
Was out having a smoke, the sky is thin overcast with lots of heat lightning.
was watching the lightning show, and watching airplanes below.

looked above and seen a few bright stars peeking through, then noticed one of the stars moving quickly. got my binoculars to see closer. was simply a orange ball, no blinking lights, moving rapidly. 
object appeared above the cloudcover shining through.

object proceeded rapidly east. was at the horizon and unable to see further within a matter of 1-1.5 minutes from noticing it directly above.

if it was below the clouds, i would have expected to see blinking lights of a aircraft, and also unsure what aircraft has orange lights.  i will be looking up more often at early evening time.

i make no assumptions on what it is...I know what it isnt and thats about it.

if i see more of these objects, i will invest in getting a high quality camera and set up as much evidence gathering equipment (i am a skeptic, so i know what i would be satisfied with as far as being something more than simply a airplane or satellite.)

sfx
content.summary: Orange orb moving from w to e rapidly.

content.detailedDescription:
I've already spoken with a local mufon investigator and was told i should report this.

on friday, june 12, at 11:50 p.M. cdst, i was looking at the stars and 
noticed one that appeared to fade then brighten.  i thought maybe it was due to my binoculars, so i lowered them and looked again.  sure enough, the light would fade almost completely, then it would brighten again.  
the pattern was as follows: bright for 10 seconds, dim to almost nothing for about 3 seconds, brighten again for 10 seconds, and so forth.  the light, which was approx. the same magnitude as sirius but half the size in appearance, was 70 degrees above the ene horizon. looking at it through binoculars it looked as though 2 white lights were stuck together, side to side.  it did appear as though the light was moving ever so slightly in an easterly direction.
i watched this light for a few minutes then began scanning the northern sky.  it was then that a (black shadow) triangular object flew almost directly over my head, in a west to east heading.  my best guess would be that it was 500 ft. (or more) in elevation and the size of a soccer ball held at arms length.  it was totally silent, with no lights at all.  the reason i saw it was due to the fact that the object appeared darker than the night sky behind it, and that the shadowy form blocked out the stars.  i only saw it for about 2 seconds, long enough for it to "register".  since i can not give a definitive altitude of the object, i won't speculate it's speed. i can say that the triangular shape even, with what appeared to be rounded points at each end.
when i looked again for the light that had been dimming, it was gone.  the time was now 12:05 a.M., june 13, 2009.

i will be speaking with the mufon investigator again tomorrow and will give her a full report, as well as the drawing of what i saw.

1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
star gazing in my back yard.
2. what made you first notice the object?
i first noticed the dimming, star-like object, then felt the need to scan the sky. i was about to turn my attention back to the star-like object, when i saw the dark triangular object.
3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
at first i thought the light was a star, until it moved.  when i saw the second object i knew it was not any type of airplane that we have locally.
4. describe the object and its actions and motions.
see description above.
5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
at first i felt somewhat surprised, which then turned to concern.  
6. how did you lose sight of the object?
both object simply vanished.
content.summary: Two objects seen, 1 star-like and the other a black triangle that flew over my house.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
My house is between grain valley and blue springs, we are rural enough that we can see the night sky clearly, especially to the south/southeast. we have a small pond to our south and sit facing there to chat on spring and summer evenings
we first discovered what we thought was a satellite, but realized after a couple of minutes that it was pulsating, varying shades of color and degrees of light output. it also made darting movements that would be impossible to recreate in any known aircraft. it remained far away, but reappeared every night in the same general direction. 
the best parts were when it would appear early, during twilight and was very easily visible. those were the times when it seemed to be pursued by military aircraft. they would "buzz" the object(and our house)in combat formations and we could watch the object dart in a different direction, as if playing with the pilots.
 we have 3 generations of former military personell in this home, so we consider ourselves objective. i have always maintained that this is a ufo, only because it is unidentified to me. aside from the encounters the aircraft had with this object, it did seem reasonable that it could be a test aircraft of some kind, and even if it was something from outside this world, i am confident that the military does know it was here.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sightings almost every night for about a year.

content.detailedDescription:
I just found this site and wanted to share my experience from 25 years ago.

i was probably 5-6 years old at the time. i remember i was sitting at the kitchen table. the time was probably 10-12 am, broad sunlight not a cloud in the sky. at one point i looked out of the window and saw a silver round object high in the sky. i could not determine its size or exact form, but it was definitely round, and appeared spherical from the distance. i was able to track it for about 5-6 seconds as it was moving slowly away in a parabolic manner and disappeared from view. the object was definitely following a flight path, rather than moving erratically. by the time i was able to call anyone else it was gone. i have never seen anything similar since then. i have no explanation, and probably that's way i remember the occasion so vividly.
content.summary: Silver sphere in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
On late friday night into the early hours of saturday my friend and myself were in my back yard observing some party-goers coming from a party on my street.  we were facing north, away from the house, standing in the yard watching two people when a vertical line of bright lights caught both of our attention. at this point it was 1:05 am.  we both stood up as high as we could to try and decipher what we were looking at.  a large tree obstructed our view somewhat at first, until the object rose to a height that was no longer blocked by the tree.  at first glance it appeared that it was multiple bright orbs, but we immediately realized that it was one bright orb that was dropping something else that was very bright as well.  it became apparent that the object was slowly rising from the treeline.  the orb or sphere was a bright white light, and at some moments appeared a red color.  as it slowly rose in elevation, things were either being dropped from the object or falling from it.  the substance that was falling from the orb was just as bright as the object itself, but smaller in size.  it did not look like there were other orbs falling from it, but almost a liquid-like substance falling at free fall speed towards the ground.  we never saw anything touch the ground, the things falling lost their bright light before reaching the ground or trees below it.  i questioned running inside to get a camera but decided not to leave.  the falling substance/objects appeared bright white and sometimes red as well.  

the object was roughly 1 mile to 1.5 miles away from us, and was n,ne from our position.  when we first saw it, it was aproximately 10-15 degrees off the horizon, but eventually rose to about 30 or 35 degrees.  it appeared to be anywhere from 300 to 500 feet in the air
i live sw of csu campus, and we were looking in the sky just north of the west side of campus.

the object slowly rose for about 2 or 3 minutes, then at 1:08 it stopped rising and hovered in one spot.  at this point the object had not moved in a horizontal motion at all, only moving up.  the object hovered and the unknown substance was still falling from it. it hovered in one spot for about two minutes. throughout the encounter the substance seemed to be falling at a constant rate, if i had to guess i would say every 1 to 2 seconds another glowing substance would fall from the orb. the substance continued to fall until about 1:10 am, when the object's bright light faded.  it now appeared to be a much smaller red light, about the size of a very bright star in the distance.  it was hard to see now, and it began moving west from its origional position.  it also appeared to climb in elevation a great amount within seconds, because soon our view was obstructed by clouds.  as it faded away, it was extremely hard to keep your eye on it, it looked like a very distant star, and it was a very small red light.  the light appeared and then became obstructed by the clouds, only to reappear again but a little further westward.  we tried to keep our eyes on it but by 1:15 am we could no longer see anything.  

we waited outside and continued to scan the skies for planes or helicopters but did not see or hear anything further.  we drove around town in the area under where we thought the object might have been, trying to see if we could see or hear anything unusual but found nothing.

it was a very busy friday night and i am sure that we were not the only ones who could have seen this.
content.summary: Bright orb hovering and dropping unknown substance/objects.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in the back yard. looked up to a see flying object at aprx 2500 ft moving north east.  object was silver, had very bright light on (one or two).  was flying erratically. suddenly reversed direction, came back towards my location.  i had a very clear view of the object, although it was flying silently.  i could not get an accurate estimate of its size since i didn't know its exact altitude.  it may have been fifty feet long.  about that time it started climbing straight up at a tremendous rate of speed until it disappeared into the clouds. (it was not an airplane, nor a blimp, nor a helicopter.)

1. i was in the back yard trying to fish a frog out of the swimming pool.

2. i saw a reflection of the flying object in the water.

3. initially i thought it was a balloon, then i realized it didn't fit the description. no shroud lines.  somewhat erratic behavior.  when it elevated in altitude, it went straight as an arrow.

4. it moved erratically, possibly as a result of wind currents.  it went up at unbelievable rate.

5. i strongly suspected i had seen a "flying saucer."  i have been around aircraft all my life. 
 
6. disappeared into the clouds.
content.summary: Over house at 2500 ft, went up.

content.detailedDescription:
I posted this account on our rips (reading investigators of paranormal studies) myspace and asked if anyone had had a similar experience. to date...No response. however, at our last meeting a fellow member brought to our attention that an article was published in march in our local paper concerning several sightings in and around the berks area in the early months of 2009. after reading this account, we decided to report this event. this is what i wrote on the rips myspace blog in february 2009...


ok guys...This is just amazing. but i do trust my husband and he has never in my 34+ years of being with him has he ever been untruthful...Teasing, sometimes boastful...But never a liar!!!

this morning at 5:45 he let the dogs out for their morning 'piss call'. he went back inside to prepare diego's insulin shot. while watching the dogs through the kitchen window 'do their thing' he noticed a single bright light, moving slowly about tree-top height just below and beyond our lower yard. being so near the airport, he thought at first it was a plane in trouble. he went outside to get the dogs and view the light further. it was then that he saw a form....Yes...Saucer shaped with a dome in the upper mid center. he didn't have his glasses on or any appropriate clothing to fully investigate it but he did see enough of it to describe its shape and its path of travel. the light was not a beam shining downward nor did it shine outward but the light did illuminate the saucer's shape from the edges. the form was level and hovering momentarily and silently at tree-top height. it then moved toward and over the neighbor's house when its light went out and disappeared. curiously, diego is forever barking at planes and birds that fly over and near the house, but not this time. in fact, both dogs never even reacted to it. later in the day he walked down to the area but nothing seemed to be 'out of place' or disturbed. he is still shaking his head in disbelief and i only wish i had been awake and downstairs to witness it too!!! 


i just wonder if others had seen or spotted something unusal in the skies of late.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Disc shaped saucer w/dome illuminated by white/yellow light, sometimes intense and pulsating. also viewed round 'bubbled' windows on the saucer's angled surface of the saucer area.

content.detailedDescription:
People lets get real. we have visitors who are revealing themselves to us. and they are working hard to get our attention in the skies. our friends are all over the world showing themselves and the crafts they fly. our technology does not have the capability to travel like they do. they are far more advanced then we are. i believe they are monitoring are daily activities and watching movements. for some reason they will not leave. i think humans are comming to the crossroads of self extinction and firmly believe they are here to prevent it. sometime in the near future they will land and organize a better world so man kind would get along better. if man does want to change , i think we would have no alternative with them here. its a peaceful warning from them. please adhere. they are here to spread the message of peace.





bruce kaselberg!
content.summary: People they are here!

content.detailedDescription: This is an old story, but true.  while i was stationed at mountain home air force base, mt. home, idaho, i and a friend, who was an iranian air traffic control exchange student (he was in the iranian air force), was walking outside our dormitory and looked up at the sky and saw what we thought was a star, going across the night skyline.  at first we thought maybe it was a satelite, it was deep in the sky, appeared to be star like.  as we continued to watch it cross the sky, it took a sharp right angle turn.  nothing we knew of could have made such a turn, that deep into space.  i don't know how high it was, but it was out of our atomosphere and seemed to be deep into space.  it was an extremely clear, dark night and the sky was lit up with stars.  i do not remember the iranian's name, but i believe his nickname was "sam'.  he and his fellow student left just after the fall of the shah of iran and i think they just disappeared into the us somewhere as sam said he would not go back.  the date and time are very approximate, it may have been 1978, but it was so remarkable that i have never forgotten it.  we both thought the object was not of this world.
content.summary: Star crossing night sky makes right angle turn.

content.detailedDescription:
Reference the following reports:  17056,17327,17431,17438...

i have several minutes of video of a very large craft flying enormous circles around my town. 

everytime i go to take video of this object i think its some sort of airplane.  but once in a while it will stop in the distance and many other lights will appear around it.

the size and shape are difficult to determine but aside from the very first sighting i can hear this object.  it sounds like a low roaring jet engine.  

there are usually 3 white lights in a triangle formation that are constantly lit, although at times there are only two.  there is always a flashing red and a flashing white light.

i have no idea what this is and am very conflicted as to what i am seeing.  if this is an airplane what is it doing flying circles around my town, and what are all the light anomalies that i am seeing?

i will have video uploaded before the weekend is over but i have video from the 10th to the 13th of this object.

this craft is accompanied by flashes of light in the sky.  i have video record from the 10th of bright flashes of light coming from the direction of the ursa major constellation.

i need someone to review and enhance my video as soon as possible.
content.summary: Triangle light formation circling my town.

content.detailedDescription:
I was returnig to my home by car.
my position was very close to s���o paulo (brazil) downtown.
a glitering object calls my atention in the sky ( about 45��� zenith angle)
in my perception the objetct was very high ( about 6000 feet or more)
what was very strange in these spot was the trajetory and the intensity of light:
1-the spot crosses the sky in a not linear trajetory ( going from right to left ) going up and down, stopping some times.I use some tall tv antenas to get a good geometrical reference to be sure about the trajetory.
note: my car was not moving because of intense car traffic that allow me to  look to the sky during about 3 minutes.
2- the object shows a white light with an intensity oscilation ( it looks like a glitering). the light oscilation did not obey a frequency that could be similar to a normal airplane. sometimes there was no light but only a grey spot for 2 or 3 secounds( i am not sure about the shape of the object because it was too high).But the light, in its maximum intensity, was very strong


as the traffic allows me to move about 300 feet ahead, i park my car to get out and watch the fenomena better. this takes about 20 secounds, and when i look again to the sky where the objetc was moving, it was gone. 

note: i am mechanical engineer and have a good logical perception of phisical fenomenas.
content.summary: Glittering light spot swinging in a not linear trajectory.

content.detailedDescription:
i was sitting on my tailgate in the parking lot last night at 8:20pm. i noticed an object that was not there a few minutes before. at first it looked like a box kite.Then it changed shape & looked like a regular triangle kite. then it changed shape again .This time it appeared like a metal framed box with a small cylinder type top.By this time i was getting pretty scared. i rubbed my eyes & it was gone that quick& made no sound at all.I had just taking a picture with my cell phone when i noticed it.But it was noticable in photo.
   myt first thought was a kid had got a kite caught on a power line. but i soon realized that was not what i was seeing.But by its actions it was not a kite at all. i can't explain it.
content.summary: Spotted while sitting on tailgate in parking lot.

content.detailedDescription:

she saw ufo last night

it was round, very fast, and leaving a trail for it... not only she.. 2 people was with her

it went very fast behind a fortress

it appear, it was round, left a trail.. and went behind the tower so they were not able to see it any more

she describe like a fire ball, leaving a trail

but i was not going down... so i guess its not meteor 

green, blue, yellow [in color]

but i was going horizontal 

and it was very low, like 200-300 meters 

.........................................

it was shiny

4. describe the object and its actions and motions.

6. how did you lose sight of the object?
went behind tower
..........................................

[end of report]
content.summary: Ufo; possible meteor.

content.detailedDescription: I was out side and looked up. it was cloudy but i saw this big object coming across my yard in the sky. it was as big as a football field with lights going slow with no noise at all i watched it go over me and i felt weard like it was no big deal real strange. i went in and told my wife but acted like it was no diffrent than if i saw a car. real strange i thought.
content.summary: Gigantic circle with lights diffrent color lights.

content.detailedDescription:
On may 11.2009 traveling threw new england over the mass turnpike i captured a orange triangle ufo, and many other anomilies, small grey humaniods, balls of lite, liteshafts coming down around me, i also been very ill since this occured....I,m wondering what to tell my doctor about this, because i think thats why i,m ill, the ufo is right over my car....I have the video and still shots of this amaizing ufo.

witness spoke on phone with dispatcher and provided the following information: 6-13-09 . . .  been feeling sick, nausea, started next day after taking video, says he is having the same symptoms as radiation poisoning, headache, light headedness, fatigue, sleeping all the time, unable to work. has a scab on his back and a lump on his back and doesn���t remember them being there before.The aliens he talks about is from the small gray probes you see in the video, the light shift comes in the beginning of the video where a car is coming at him he freezes the picture says it is like the sun reflection but they are surrounding his car, he is wiling to send us the unedited video for viewing, the camera used was a samsung digimax v5, 12x zoom has a schnieder lens 7.7 ��� 23.1 mm , resolution 5.30 mpixel, the bars on the video is from editing part of the screen, the slowing down portion of the video is from freeze frame . . .  mufon dispatch s.Cox 6-13-09
content.summary: Driving threw new england taking some video of scenery.

content.detailedDescription: At 9:50pm est was outside stargazing after two people left who came to see a piece of furniture i was selling being stored in the garage. i noticed a very bright star or planet just a few degrees to the east of the big dipper arm and said to my self that is not in the right place as i am an amateur astronomer. the skies were clear but with summer haze so that i could barely see secondary stars. as my eyes adjusted to it's precise location in relation to known stars i perceived it to be moving at a much slower pace than common aircraft speed but also at altitude equal to common airliners. i did not notice any flashing red wing lights, just a single bright point of light. at that point the object seemed very odd to me although i am located in a high traffic aircraft zone military and commercial. the object then made an abrupt acceleration northbound at tremendous velocity that i perceived supersonic because of my naval aviation experience. i did not see any afterburner or hear any sonic boom. i quickly ran to the south side of my neighbors parking area so that i would not lose sight of the object as it moved towards the tree line on the north side of the property. as i looked up again after moving i could not relocate it.
content.summary: Northbound planet like object accelerating from slow to high speed.

content.detailedDescription:
The first one looked like fast moving aircraft but it was just a bright spot,the best shape description above would be star.  i thought it was an aircraft even though it was going very fast.  i was standing on my front porch and saw it moving across the sky.  i watch it as it went behind the tree across the street then it appeared between the two trees in the yard across the street.  but it never came out the other side.  it had just disappeared as it passed behind the second tree.  

the second was a few nights later.  i was on my porch again while my dog was outside doing his business.  there was an unusual sound, like an aircraft but not like an aircraft.  deeper and more of a hum than a jet engine sound.  i lived on the flight path to the air base growing up and planes would come over daily, flying very low, so i know what air planes sound like, this was different.  it was a sound that you felt.  as i saw the aircraft it was moving very slow, far to slow to be a plane and still remained in the air.  i didn't really see the body of the craft it seemed to be in a cloud but it seemed no higher than my tree tops.  what i did see was three lights in a triangle shape they seemed to be below the cloud or bright enough that the cloud didn't effect my seeing them.   it was so low it frightened me so i got my dog and went in the house but it was directly overhead when i got to the door.  i've never seen anything like that before or since.  it was fairly large but not as big as the stealth bomber.  maybe 20 or 30 feet across the widest part about as wide as my house.  i couldn't tell you if it was an isosceles or equilateral triangle shape.  it freaked me out so much because it was so close and i got a really ominous feeling about it that i just got inside as quick as i could.

i thought about telling someone back them but i didn't know who i could tell.  i just saw on the news about the sitings at umkc.  i thought sence your keeping track of these sitings i should maybe tell  you.
content.summary: Two sightings within a week.

content.detailedDescription: Silver aluminum disc shape object in the sky, reflecting from the sun, moving extremely fast, noway it was a airplane, made no noise.  very swift and accurate in movement... saw another same sighting back in 7/12/2000   clear blue sky , warm weather, sunny day, both times of sightings was in the day clear sky
content.summary: Silver aluminum disc, reflective from sun.

content.detailedDescription:
I was getting my car washed at a car wash on watertown ave. waterbury,ct.
there was about 4 other people looking at it from the car was. i saw these guys looking up at the sky and asked them what they were looking at and they said there was something in the clouds that was not moving. i am a veteran of the air-foce. i have seen two ufo's in my life time. i am now, age 63. i saw another ufo aorund 1960 while i was fishing off the beach at
night with my neighbors, the williams. we all saw it hovering on the horizon, just a bright light, then it shot off into the sky and disappeared. it had to have been a ufo. no air plane could have done that.  the movement was similiar to that of betty and barie hill. it rose fore a short distance, came back down, then shot up into the sky.

john dibiase
meriden,ct.
content.summary: Round object hovering in the clouds above watertown, ct.

content.detailedDescription:
Tonight everything came together for us.Me,and dave have been wanting to have a sky watch now for the last month.Last time we tried we had my friend bill,me,dave,and billy cox,and it ended up being way to cloudy.So today i took a look at the weather report,and to my surprise the report called for clear skies.I gave dave a call,and asked if he could come down for a sky watch tonight,and he said he could.He was to meet me at my house at 8pm,but at 6:00 it was looking like the weather man was wrong,but around 7:30 the skies started to clear.Before he showed up i took a look online to see what was to fly over,and at what time.The only thing i found was the hubble telescope at 9:41pm.A little after 8 dave showed up,and we got everything set up.He told me he had still been seeing a few in the morning when he gets home from work,but we did not think we would see much.After spaying a bottle of bug spray on each of us we got started.

it did not take long for things to get started,around 8:30 we seen the first one,and our neighbor happened to be outside at the time,and she watched it with us.From that point forward they never stopped coming,it seemed every 10 mins we would see one.Just a bit after the hubble flew over we seen two nice ones that were following the same path,and same speed.All together we seem around 12 of them,we did not keep track so that a low guess.They all were the same like we always see but one.The one that was different i seen through my binoculars.I was trying to focus my binoculars because i found out it had two focus adjustment's,so i was looking at a bright star,and that when i seen this white circle like a ufo on its side,and this thing was big.I looked without the binoculars to see if i could see it to show dave where it was,but i could only see it through the binoculars.It was going north to south,and i watched it for ten seconds,and it was gone.

if you live in florida pick a clear night,and sit outside from 8:30 to 10pm,and you'll see them for sure.I just want to know what they are,two of them came so close to each other i thought they were going to hit,and i know we would never put to flying objects that close to each other.I'm not sure if these things are in out atmosphere,or outside it,but i do know they are very high up.Almost everyone we seen tonight changed direction,or speed,something in natural orbit would not do that.I still have to upload my photos,and video to see if any of them showed up,and if i do catch something i'll be sure to post it,i have only check the first few,and the photo at the top of this story is the third we took.If anyone seen the same objects tonight,or would like to talk with me go to my chat site i leave open at http://www.Ufology.Chatango.Com or you can contact at my email worldufospace@gmail.Com

like i said i don't have the right cameras to get them on film or tape

this is the third report i;ve made i need an investigator with a night vision camcorder,or high power digital camera so we can get these on tape good my camcorder is very old,every night we watch we seen them,the least we ever seen was two the most was close to 15.We had a local journalist came out to see them,and he did,he also did a couple stories on that night call me and i'll link you to the articles he wrote.I just want to know what these are,and for someone to take us seriously and help us/
content.summary: 12 more ufos seen on our sky watch on the 10th.

content.detailedDescription: At 630pm i stepped out on my porch to smoke a cigarette,when i looked up in the sky i noticed a large blue light,ithought it was a star at first,until i noticed that it was shaped like a diamond.I went inside and grabbed my binoculars,& my wife and kids.Outside again i focused in on the object,which had a diamond shape and what appeared to be white lights on the sides ,it would change colors,blue,orange,red,and something on the bottom kept appearing,a small ball or something,it remained motionless for about 30 minutes,then slowly traveled away from our sight into the clouds,during the sighting i pointed it out to my neighbors who also saw it.Nobody seen anything like it.
content.summary: Object hovered in sky, changed colors, had white lights, changed colors, had binoculars with me, after 45 minutes floated slowly away, people in town also seen it, had a definite diamond shape.

content.detailedDescription:
Just north of the peace bridge high tension wires span the niagra river from buffalo, ny tp fort erie, canada. on the american side, a few yards north of the power lines, the embankment runs high, blocking the view of the river from the corner where school street starts east from niagra street.
on a warm septemeber 1956 afternoon, the northbound niagra street bus dropped me at this corner on my way home from high school. walking the short block east to prospect avenue, i crossed school street to a small triangular park bordered by niagra, school and prospect.  to my right across prospect and four houses down, was my house. but as i started to turn that way, a bright, blinking light caught my attention.
my first fleeting thought was "ye;;ow piper cub', then my eyes focused solidly and i was staring at a brass colored disc, the light atop rapidly blinking red, green and white. it hovered silently, completely motionless, and as hard as i tried, i could not discern any windows, markings or seams. and the light made it impossible to see the superstructure.
it was slightly north, and higher than the power lines, perhaps 800 feet above the water. my immediate impulse was to run home to get my father. but i was mesmerized, staring, finally walking slowly back toward it, toward niagra street.
gradually i became aware of the sound of jet aircraft approaching from the north. the roar of their afterburners started to hurt my ears, but they were out of sight, close to the water, then suddenly rocketing up into view toward the disc at a 60 degree climb. two f-86 fighters, close enough that i cold see the piots. and an instant after they flashed into sight the disc took ff so fast it blurred, streaking out over lake erie. any sound it made accelearting was drowned out by the jets.
for a brief moment that all three aircraft were in view the disc appeared to be about half again as big as the jets.
the following day a brief article about "mysterious" lights over the lake was published on an inside page of the buffalo evening news. a quote from the niagra falls air force base denied both radar contact and scrambled aircraft.
after watching "ufo hunters" air older sightings on the history channel, i decided to finally get this sighting into the record.
content.summary: Afternoon. a silent, brass colored disc is hovering in front of me. superstructure atop is obscured by intense light, blinking red, green, white.
